short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the theme of your current webpage into Dark or Light Mode

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is solely based on improving your productivity. This will help you to change the theme of any webpage you visit into theme of your choice.
